net.kuujo.copycat

Class CopycatClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.kuujo.copycat.Copycat
      • net.kuujo.copycat.CopycatClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Managed<Copycat>

    public final class CopycatClient
extends Copycat
    Client-side Copycat implementation.

    This is a Copycat implementation that executes all Resource operations remotely via a RaftClient.

    Author:
    Jordan Halterman

    • Method Detail

      • builder

        public static CopycatClient.Builder builder(Member... members)
        Returns a new Copycat client builder.

        The provided set of members will be used to connect to the Raft cluster. The members list does not have to represent the complete list of servers in the cluster, but it must have at least one reachable member.

        Parameters:
        members - The cluster members to which to connect.
        Returns:
        The client builder.

      • builder

        public static CopycatClient.Builder builder(Collection<Member> members)
        Returns a new Copycat client builder.

        The provided set of members will be used to connect to the Raft cluster. The members list does not have to represent the complete list of servers in the cluster, but it must have at least one reachable member.

        Parameters:
        members - The cluster members to which to connect.
        Returns:
        The client builder.

      • builder

        public static CopycatClient.Builder builder(Members members)
        Returns a new Copycat client builder.

        The provided set of members will be used to connect to the Raft cluster. The members list does not have to represent the complete list of servers in the cluster, but it must have at least one reachable member.

        Parameters:
